author: CopyPetPet
text: mmm unlike Basketball (where luck is limited) football has massive luck, mental and motivation factors that account for 50% of the possible outcome (the other 50% being skill aka technical and tactical superiority aka quality level). So ITS COMPLETELY IMPOSIBLE TO PREDICT A GAME BEFORE HAND. Don't let anyone bullshit you saying 'A' wins 100% against 'B'. Wrong, the best team, even if its superior by a massive margin, only has HIGHER (and the bigger the quality margin the higher) probabilities of winning the game. Its like a middle ground between chess (no luck) and a roulette (100% luck). Besides luck, mentality and motivation (if you are an underdog against a top national team you get advantage here) also plays a big role. So if you are choosing favorites based on how good they are, there is no guarantee they will make it, even if they are the best by far. Will they be the most probable to win the WC? Yes. Will that 1 team win it? most likely not. You just need to go with your home country, and if you lose, just choose whatever culture you reasonate most with.
